H0.text: When people talk about LGBT rights, what does the ‘T’ represent. Transgender

H1.text: When people talk about LGBT rights, what does the ‘T’ represent. Transexual

H2.text: When people talk about LGBT rights, what does the ‘T’ represent. Third Gender

H3.text: When people talk about LGBT rights, what does the ‘T’ represent. Hegirl

A4.text: Transgender individuals have been part of various LGBTQ movements throughout history, with significant contributions dating back to the early days of the gay liberation movement.

A5.text: One of these groups directly related to transgender support is the National Center for Transgender Equality (NCTE), which is committed to advocating for policy changes that protect transgender people and promote equality.
